title: Where did Type-Expertise go? (the pending classification system)
content: Anyone know what happened to the classification work by Dennis Ravizza: [http://www.type-expertise.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131021144414/http:/www.type-expertise.com/ "http://www.type-expertise.com")? The domain name is for sale, and a search brings up nothing. If it's still a going concern, I'd like to include it an a discussion on classification in my upcoming book. Thanks.
author: dgc
